title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and Go library for running large language models locally; supports Llama-2, CodeLlama, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: First-class LangChain LLM and chat component that wraps Ollama’s local endpoints for retrieval-augmented generation chains.

title: ollama-js on npm
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama HTTP API—browser & Node compatible.

title: ollama-python on PyPI
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; install with pip and talk to local LLMs in two lines.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui (now Open-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich self-hosted web interface for Ollama with chat history, RAG, user auth and admin panel.

title: jmorganca/ollama-fastapi
summary: Lightweight FastAPI service that exposes additional REST endpoints on top of Ollama for easier micro-service integration.

title: ollama-rag on GitHub
summary: Streamlit demo showing retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama + Chroma for local document Q&A.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Clean React chat interface that consumes Ollama’s REST API, supports markdown and code highlighting.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) published to Docker Hub; run Ollama in one command.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Bash-based interactive chat CLI that colors markdown and stores conversation history locally.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord bot that lets server members chat with any Ollama model via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that listens in channels/DMs and responds using a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-obsidian-plugin
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM prompts inside your notes and insert completions.

title: ollama-vscode extension
summary: VS Code extension that adds a sidebar chat powered by Ollama, supports code generation & explanation.

title: ollama-copilots
summary: Collection of GitHub Copilot-style adapters (neovim, VS Code) backed by Ollama instead of cloud APIs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-dotnet
summary: .NET 8 client library and CLI for Ollama with dependency injection helpers for ASP.NET Core.

title: ollama-llamaindex
summary: LlamaIndex LLM and embedding integration letting you build local RAG pipelines on top of Ollama.

title: r/ollama subreddit
summary: Active community discussing new models, troubleshooting, and sharing projects built with Ollama.
